st: Aankhe To Pyar Mein Dill Ki Juban Hoti Hai,
s:
Aankhe To Pyar Mein Dill Ki Juban Hoti Hai,
Chahat To Sada Bejuban Hoti Hai,
Pyar Mein Dard Bhi Mile To Kya Ghabrana,
Suna Hai Dard Se Chahat Or Jawan Hoti Hai…

st: Fir Wahi Fasaana Afsaana Sunaati Ho
s:
Fir Wahi Fasaana Afsaana Sunaati Ho
Dil Ke Paas Hoon Kah Kar Dil Jalati Ho
Beqaraar Hai Aatish E Nazar Se Milne Ko
To Fir Kyon Nahi Pyaar Jataati Ho…

st: Teri Har Ada Mohabbat Si Lagti Hain
s:
Teri Har Ada Mohabbat Si Lagti Hain
Ek Pal Ki Bhi Judai Muddat Si Lagti Hain
Pehle Nahi Soocha Tha
Aab Soochne Lage Hain
Jindgi Me Har Pal Teri Jarroorat Si Lagti Hain…

st: Aapke Husn Ko Dekhkar O Sanam,
s:
Aapke Husn Ko Dekhkar O Sanam,
Sabhi Jaane Kyun Ghas Khakar Gir Jaate Hain,

Aap Apne Husn Ko Kahin Chhupa Lijiye,
Varna Yeh Log Tog Bemout Mare Jaate Hain…

st: Na Bejhti Ho Khat Kya Koi Khata Ho Gayi Hai,
s:
Na Bejhti Ho Khat Kya Koi Khata Ho Gayi Hai,
Daak Ki Hadtaal Hai Ya Pata Kho Gaya Hai,

Kis Taraf Teri Najar Hai Kis Taraf Yeh Khyal Hai,
Paanv Gungru Chham Chham Morni Si Chal Hai,

Tere Mere Pyar Mein Najar Ki Najakat Chahiye,
Jab Milan Ki Raat Ho Tab Sarafat Chahiye….

st: Mohalle Mein Nayi Maasuk Aaayi Hai,
s:
Mohalle Mein Nayi Maasuk Aaayi Hai,
Lekar Nakhre Purane,
Lajawab Husn Hai Log Mar Kar Hi Rahenge,

Moti Hai, Kaali Hai, Thigani Hai, To Hone De,
Use Lekar Konsa Tu Ghumne Ja Raha Hai Europ,

st: Lipat Jaao Ek Baar Fir Gale Hamare,
s:
Lipat Jaao Ek Baar Fir Gale Hamare,
Koi Deevar Na Rahe Beech Hamaare Tumhare,

Lipat Jaati Jaroor Agar Jamane Ka Dar Na Hota,
Bassa Leti Main Tumko Agar Seene Mein Ghar Hota,

st: Tanhaion me ham aapko yaad bahut karte hai,
s:
Tanhaion me ham aapko yaad bahut karte hai,
aap khush rahai karke ham o rab se fariyaad karte hai,
ham aapki mushkurahat dekne ke liya behsabri se intezar
Kar rahe hai,
Aap kya jaane mere jaan aapko dekne ke liye,
Ham be-inteha se tadap rahe hai…

st: Tere Husn Ko Parde Ki Zaroorat Hi Kya Hai Zaalim,
s:
Tere Husn Ko Parde Ki Zaroorat Hi Kya Hai Zaalim,
Kon Rehta Hai Hosh Main Tujhe Dekhne K Baad…

st: Itne Haseen Chehre Ko Dekh Kar Chand Bhi Sarma Gya,
s:
Itne Haseen Chehre Ko Dekh Kar Chand Bhi Sarma Gya,
Aaya Mere Paas Or Chupke Se Farma Gya,
Ke Jaa Rha Hu Main Chhupane Ko Apni Ye Khoobsoorti,
Kyu Ki Mujh Se Bhi Haseen Koi Aaya Or Iss Jahaan Per Chha Gya…

st: Is ada se gar qatal karoge,
s:
Is ada se gar qatal karoge,
Be-maut hi mer jayenge parwane,
Shama roshan to ho ek bar,
Dekhein kitna dum hai teri roshani mein…

st: Tujhko Khuda Ne Ruk-Ruk Banaya,
s:
Tujhko Khuda Ne Ruk-Ruk Banaya,
Saari Khudai Tujh Mein Hi Bhar Di,
Har Ang Tera,
Reh-Reh Tu Barse Savan Maheena…

st: Itni haya itna tabassum kyu hai aaj in aakho me,
s:
Itni haya itna tabassum kyu hai aaj in aakho me,
kyu bahak rahi hai tu kya basa hai in saanso me,
hai tu mera aks meri parchhai meri jaan tu,
aa main bhar du bas phool hi phool teri in raaho me…

st: Izhar mohabbat ka kuch Ese hua,
s:
Izhar mohabbat ka kuch Ese hua,
Kya kahein pyaar kaise hua,
Unki ek jhalk pe neesar hue ham,
Saadgi Mein marmite or aankho se ikraar hua…

st: Tune rukh se naqab kya uthaya,
s:
Tune rukh se naqab kya uthaya,
Kambakhat dil moonh ko hone laga,
Sharma, sitare hain chhupne lage,
Mehtab baadalon se jo nikalne laga…

st: Jahan dekhu samne nazar aati ho tum
s:
Jahan dekhu samne nazar aati ho tum
Pyar ki parchhaiyon se hamesha yaad aati ho tum
Mere Khwabon ki duniya mein rehti ho tum
Mere pass aa ke muskurati ho tum
Mohabbat ki in raaho mein aa ke tadapati ho tum
Pyar hume dekar door chali jati ho tum…

st: Dil ki kitab me tumara naam sajayenge,
s:
Dil ki kitab me tumara naam sajayenge,
Apne har lamhe me tum ko basayenge,
Agar tum se ek pal ke liye bhi dur huye,
To har baar aankhe band kar ke milne aayenge…

st: Samajh Nahi Aata Suruaat Kaise Karein
s:
Samajh Nahi Aata Suruaat Kaise Karein
Aapse Pehli Mulakat Kaise Karein
Pyaar To Behad Kartein Hai Aapse Magar
Is Mohabbat Ka Izhaar Kaise Karein
Yaar To Kahte Hain Wo Inkaar Nahi Karenge
Magar Bina Aapke Haan Sune Is Baat Par Vishwaas Kaise Karein
Kuch To Kahte Hain Dil Na Laga Baithna Barbaad Ho Jaayega
Magar Bina Aapke Saath Rehkar Iss Baat Ka Ahsaas Kaise Karein…

st: Jo maine hai likha usey bhi dikhana,
s:
Jo maine hai likha usey bhi dikhana,
pata chale usey ek tha uska bhi deewana,
Uski hassi ne, nazar ne, mujhe kiya tha deewana,
Ab muskil hai ussey bhula pana…

st: Aaj usne mujhse mera haal pucha hai,
s:
Aaj usne mujhse mera haal pucha hai,
bada muskil sa sawal pucha hai,
hichkiyon ka aalam tha aur,
baaton ko taal pucha hai,
jyada kuch to nahi par,
jo bhi pucha hai kamal pucha hai…

st: Kuch Likh Nhi Pate Kuch Suna Nhi Pate
s:
Kuch Likh Nhi Pate Kuch Suna Nhi Pate
Haal-e-Dil Zuban Pe La Nhi Pate
Wo Utar Gye Hai Dil Ki Gehraiyo Me
Wo Samjh Nhi Pate, Hum Samjha Nhi Pate…

st: Mahekta hua jism tera gulaab jaisa hai,
s:
Mahekta hua jism tera gulaab jaisa hai,
neend k safar mein tu khwaab jaisa hai,
do ghoo.nt pee lene de aankhon ki mastiya,
nasha teri aankhon ka sharab ke jaam jaisa hai…

st: Kash Hum Aapka Gussa Hote,
s:
Kash Hum Aapka Gussa Hote,
Harpal Aapke Saath Reh Paate,
Kabhi Itarate, Kabhi Ruth Jate,
Kabhi Apne Aap Me Kho Jate,
Par Zindagi Bhar Apke Kareeb to Reh Paate…

st: kinj dassan te samjawan kiwen
s:
kinj dassan te samjawan kiwen
mere dil da haal tenu sunawan kiwen
meri jind vi tu te meri jaan vi tu
mera dharm vi tu te mera imaan vi tu
enna taan fikr rabb da vi ni karda
mere layi taan roza vi tu te ramjaan vi tu
lagda nahi tere waajo dil mera
meri khushi vi tu  te meri muskaan vi tu
dekhin kithhey chadd na jaayi iss paagal chandrey Rajan nu
mera armaan vi tu te meri pehchaan vi tu…

st: Uss khuda ke hatoon ka jadu ho tum
s:
Uss khuda ke hatoon ka jadu ho tum
Din mai chamakta sitara ho tum
Raat mai chandni jaisi roshni ho tum
Mere dil main basi ek shayri ho tum

st: Naa Chain Hai Naa Karaar Hai
s:
Naa Chain Hai Naa Karaar Hai
Suna Suna Sa Hai Sab, Sab Kuch Viran Hai
Ek Ajab Si Kasmakash Mein Hun
Sab Kuch Hai Pass Merey Phir Bhi Akela Hun
Sari Raat Na Soya Hun
Teri Hi Yaadon Mein Khoya Hun

st: Koi Samjhe Na Humko Beshak Par Aap To Samjhte Hain,
s:
Koi Samjhe Na Humko Beshak Par Aap To Samjhte Hain,
Apna Banate Hain Mere Har Gam Ko Tabhi To Hum Sambhalte Hain,
Khuda Har Ek Khushi De Aapko Har Ek Gam Humko Naseeb Ho,
Bas Yahi Dil Mei Sochkar Har Ek Dua Karte Hain…

st: Aye Barish Zara Tham Ke Baras,
s:
Aye Barish Zara Tham Ke Baras,
Jab Mera Yaar Aa Jaye Toh Jam Ke Baras,
Phele Na Baras Ki Woh Aa Na Sake,
Phir Itna Baras Ki Woh Ja Na Sake…

st: Bus Ab Tujhe Hi Chahne Ko Jee Chahta H,
s:
Bus Ab Tujhe Hi Chahne Ko Jee Chahta H,
Teri Yaado Me Kho Jaane Ko Jee Chahta H,
Laga Di H Tumne Aisi Ishq Ki Aag,
K Usi Me Jal Jaane Ko Jee Chahta H,
Koi Bhi Kaam Me Ab Dil Lagta Nahi,
Bus Subah Shaam Tumhara Hi Intezaar Karne Ko Jee Chahta H,
Honge Na Hum Kabhi Tujh Se Juda,
Ab To Ye Kasam Khaane Ko Jee Chahta H…

st: Tujhse Ru-B-Ru Hokar Baate Karu,
s:
Tujhse Ru-B-Ru Hokar Baate Karu,
Nigahe Milakar Wafa Ke Wade Karu,
Thaam Kar Tera Hath Baithu Tere Samane,
Teri Haseen Surat Ke Najare Karu,
Sharma Kar Najro Se Tera Kuch Chupke Kah Jana,
Teri Nigaho Ke Wo Ishare Samjhu,
Teri Har Ek Ada Par Kar Du Kayi Shayari,
Har Lafz Me Wafa Ke Dawe Karu,
Sambhale Nahi Sambhalti ‘Jaana’ Ye Dil Ki Tadap,
Tu Hi Bata Main Kab Tak Yu Aahein Bharu…

st: Bewajah Hum Wajah Dhundte Hai Tere Paas Aane Ko,
s:
Bewajah Hum Wajah Dhundte Hai Tere Paas Aane Ko,
Ye Dil Bekarar Hai Tujhe Dhadkan Mein Basaane Ko,
Bujhi Nahi Hai Pyaas In Hotho Ki Abhi,
Na Jaane Kab Milega Sukoon Mere Paymane Ko….

st: Sukoon Mere Dil Ab Kahin Kho Gaya Hai,
s:
Sukoon Mere Dil Ab Kahin Kho Gaya Hai,
Veerangi Ki Galiyon Mei Madhosh Ho Gaya Hai,
Har Pal Bas Uska Deedar Karte Hain Hum Khyalon Mein,
Ek Ajnabi Mujhko Pyaar Ki Baarish Mei Bhigo Gaya Hai….

st: Izhaar Karna Chahte Hain Hum Par Alfaaz Nahin Milte,
s:
Izhaar Karna Chahte Hain Hum Par Alfaaz Nahin Milte,
Alfaaz Milte Hain To Kuch Sawalon Ke Jawaab Nahin Milte,
Yeh Dil Kyun Ajnabiyon Pe Mar Mit-ta Hai,
Dhudte To Unko Par Koi Nisaan Nahin Milte….

st: Aap Aayenge Humse Milne Ko Agar To Hum Par Inayat Hogi
s:
Aap Aayenge Humse Milne Ko Agar To Hum Par Inayat Hogi
Chaand Taaro Ki Mehfil Sajegi Poori Unki Ibadat Hogi
Basa Lenge Us Lamhe Ko Apni Nigahon Mei Hum
Phir Na Us Rab Se Hame Koi Shikwa Shikayat Hogi…

st: Main Pagal Nahi Tha Par Ab Ho Gaya Hu
s:
Main Pagal Nahi Tha Par Ab Ho Gaya Hu
Main Ghayal Nahi Tha Par Ab Ho Gaya Hu
Suna Tha Kahi Ki Madhosh Kar Deti Hai Wo Aankhen
Maine Dekhi To Nahi Par Madhosh Ho Gaya Hu
Uthi Jab Vaadio Mein Uske Payal Ki Jhankaar
Mein Soya To Nahi Par Uske Sapno Ka Kaayal Ho Gaya Hu…

st: Ik Ladki Hai Is Dunia Mein, Jise Pyar Main Karta Hu
s:
Ik Ladki Hai Is Dunia Mein, Jise Pyar Main Karta Hu
Ik Ladki Hai Is Dunia Mein Jiski Aankho Par Marta Hu
Par Aksar Ye Khyal Mere Dil Mein Aata Rahta Hai
Wo Mujhse Pyar Bhi Karti Hai, Ya Main Pagalpan Karta Hu
Khair Khyalato Se Mujhko Ab Kya Lena Dena Hai
Jab Mere Khyalo Mein Doobi Wo, Aur Mein Itrata Rahta Hu
Aksar Chori Se Chupke Se, Wo Mujhe Nihara Karti Hai
Main Bhi Usko Hi Dekh Dekh Din-Raat Gujara Karta Hu
Suna Hai Maine Shaam Ke Waqt, Wo Gali Ko Meri Takti Hai
Main Bhi Uski Hi Raaho Mein Palko Ko Bichaye Rakhta Hu
Yu Khatm Na Ho Kissa Ye Us Se Mere Milne Ka
Bas Isiliye Din Raat Mein Uper vale Se Dua Karta Hu

st: Pyar Bhare Is Mausam Mein Teri Aamad Badi Jaroori Hai
s:
Pyar Bhare Is Mausam Mein Teri Aamad Badi Jaroori Hai
Utne Hi Hum Paas Rahege Jitni Hum Me Doori Hai
Tere Bol Hai Meri Roti, Tere Pyar Meri Majdoori Hai
Utne Hi Hum Paas Rahege Jitni Hum Me Doori Hai
Aasmaan Se Dharti Tak Bas Sab Yahi Kehte Firte Hai
Ittefaaq Se Hi To Anjaane Dil Milte Hai
Par Milna Or Bichadna Dono Jeevan Ki Majboori Hai
Utne Hi Hum Paas Rahege Jitni Hum Me Doori Hai…

st: Kya Bhulu Kya Yaad Karu,Teri Yaad Hi Aati Hai
s:
Kya Bhulu Kya Yaad Karu,Teri Yaad Hi Aati Hai
Kuch Man Ko Tadpati Hai, Kuch To Man Ko Bhati Hai
Yaad Karegi Tu Mujhko, Hamko To Ye Pata Nahi
Pata Hai Hamko Ye Ki Tu, Mere Khwaabon Mein Bhi Aati Hai
Teri Kahani Tere Hi Nagme, Yu Hi Sabko Sunata Hu
Bina Tasabbur Ke Tere Har Baat Adhuri Jaati Hai
Baat Karu Main Teri To Kyu Dunia Mujhse Jalti Hai
Yu Baat Karu Bas Teri Hi To, Unki Bhi Kya Galti Hai
Aaoge Hamare Aangan Mein, Hum Geet Bahut Se Gayenge
U Bhi Teri Hi Yaado Ki Mehfil To Ab Bhi Sajti Hai
Kya Bhulu Kya Yaad Karu…

st: Dil Ko Gam Aankho Ko Saawan Chahiye
s:
Dil Ko Gam Aankho Ko Saawan Chahiye
Mujhe Tu Nahi Bas Tera Daaman Chahiye
Sirf Chehre Se Kaha Banti Hai Baat
Ishq Mein To Dil Bhi Roshan Chahiye
Samundar Mein Kashti Hai Apni Alag
Mujhe Us Taraf Ik Kinara Chahiye
Wo Ab Kuch Masoom Se Ban Ne Lage Hai
Kuch Mujhe Bhi Mera Bachpan Chahiye
Dil Ko Gam Aankho Ko Saawan Chahiye
Mujhe Tu Nahi Bas Tera Daaman Chahiye

st: Es Sham Ne Deelayi Hai Yaad Kisi Khaas Ki
s:
Es Sham Ne Deelayi Hai Yaad Kisi Khaas Ki
Jisko Paane Ki Mujhe Aas Thi
Woh Toh Na Mili Per Unka Ehsaan Saath Hai
Yaadon Mein Hi Sahi Per Woh Aaj Bhi Mere Paas Hai…

st: Tere Saath Hone Ka Ehsas Kuch Alag Hi Hota Hai
s:
Tere Saath Hone Ka Ehsas Kuch Alag Hi Hota Hai
Pyar Se Mujhse Ladne Ka Andaz Kuch Alag Hi Hota Hai
Kuch Pal Khafa Rehna Phir Maan Jaana Bada Acha Lagta Hai
Tumhara Saath Aur Hathon Me Haath Bada Acha Lagta Hai
Jab Chale Jaate Ho Door Toh Sab Adhoora Lagta Hai
Indra Dhanus Ke Rang Bhi Phike Lagte Hain
Shayad Meri Duniya Ke Sab Rang Aap Se Hain
Aap Se Duniya Ka Mela Aur Aap Hi Se Bagh Mehak Te Hain
Aap Jo Nahi Toh Veerane Dehak Te Hain
Shamshan Se Zindagi Aur Mout Ka Saaya Dikhte Hain
Aap Ki Ek Jhalak Zindagi Hone Ka Ehsaas Hai
Doobte Suraj Ki Jaise Miti Pyaas Hai…

st: Shaam Dhal Gayi Hai Chirago Ko Roshan Kar De
s:
Shaam Dhal Gayi Hai Chirago Ko Roshan Kar De
Meri Bujhi Si Is Jindgi Mein Ab Tu Rang Bhar De
Chale Jayenge Hum Aise Ki Jaise Peer Ka Saaya
Bas Apni Muskurahat Se Meri Jholi Ko Tu Bhar De
Bulaya Ho Khuda Ne Bhi To Fir Hum Na Jayenge
Pukara Hai Mujhe Tune, Itni Ittila Kar De
Kafan Bhi Odh Lenge Hum Chale Jayenge Dunia Se
Bas Apni Aankho Ke Khanjar Se Mujhko Tu Katl Kar De…

st: Nazar Ke Sagar Mein Utar Gya Hai Koi
s:
Nazar Ke Sagar Mein Utar Gya Hai Koi
Mere Dil Mein Ghar Kar Gya Hai Koi

Uss Ki Yaad Yaadgaar Ban Gayi Hai
Jo Dil Mein Do Pal Thehar Gya Hai Koi

Kitni Pyari Hawayein Chal Rahi Hain
Lagta Hai Naik Insan Mar Gya Hai Koi

Tamaam Umar Kisi Yaar Ka Intezar Karte
Aakhir Duniya Se Guzar Gya Hai Koi

Ab Mera Bachna Na Mumkin Lagta Hai
Apni Aankh Ke Nashtar Maar Gya Hai Koi…

st: Na Chaaho Itna Hame, Chahaton Se Dar Lagta Hai
s:
Na Chaaho Itna Hame, Chahaton Se Dar Lagta Hai
Na Aao Itna Kareeb, Judai Se Dar Lagta Hai
Tumhari Wafaon Pe Bharosa Hai
Magar Apne Naseeb Se Dar Lagta Hai

st: Chura Ke Dil Ka Chain Karar Wo Kahte Hai Baat Kuch Nahi
s:
Chura Ke Dil Ka Chain Karar Wo Kahte Hai Baat Kuch Nahi
Bula Ke Apne Kareeb Jab Chhuna Chahu, To Kehte Hain Jaan Aaj Nahi
Ye Wo ‘Nahi’ Hi Bas Darmiyan Hai Ab Do Dilo Ke
Kya Ab Unke Paas Rahne Ke Bhi Kaaabil Hum Nahi…

st: Pal Pal Tumhari Yaad Mein Aahey Bhara Karte Hain
s:
Pal Pal Tumhari Yaad Mein Aahey Bhara Karte Hain
Dartey Hain Kahin Tum Mujhe Bhool Na Jaao
Isi Liye Har 2-3 Ghante Mein Tumhe Miss Call Kiya Kartey Hain
Mere Pagalpan Ki Koi Had Nahi, Tumhe Hum Itna Miss Kiya Kartey Hain
Ke Jab Bhi Tumhari Yaad Aaye Toh Tumhara Photo Leke Usey Kiss Kiya Kartey Hain…

st: Bahut Dino Baad Ek Shyam Aayi
s:
Bahut Dino Baad Ek Shyam Aayi
Sooraj Duba Aur Na Thi Koi Ruswai
Bas Dil Ki Hai Aaj Baat Suni
Palke Unka Intezar Karti Hui
Dhadkano Ki Bekarari Badhti Gayi
Aaj Milenge Unse Jaise Kiran Nayi
Bhulke Pichele Batein Kahi
Nayi Ummed Hai Aise Jagi
Chand Taaron Se Hai Raat Saji
Jo Baate Hai Humne Hai Samjhi
Kehenge Unse Aj Wahi
Unke Bina Ab Kya Hai Zindagi
Bas Baahon Mein Teri Khushi Hai Meri
Karli Ji Bas Tumse Yeh Dillagi…

st: Mera Dil Hai Jab Tak, Teri Justaju Hai
s:
Mera Dil Hai Jab Tak, Teri Justaju Hai
Meri Zubaan Jab Tak, Teri Guftagu Hai
Khuda Jaane Kya Hoga Anjaam Mera
Jahan Dekhta Hoon Tu Hi Tu Rubaru Hai…

st: Mere Dil Ka Koi Kona Khali Na Dikhe
s:
Mere Dil Ka Koi Kona Khali Na Dikhe
Ye Kis Tarah Samaye Ho
Barsaat Me Aasman Pe
Jo Ye Raat Kahan Se Laaye Ho
Meri Khushi Aur Gam Ko Pasand
Tum Sabko Bhaaye Ho
Meri Zindagi Muskurane Lagi
Aakhir Kis Sadaa Se Aaye Ho

st: Ankho Se Aankhe Milakar To Dekho
s:
Ankho Se Aankhe Milakar To Dekho
Humare Dil Se Dil Milakar To Dekho
Saare Jaha Ki Khushiyan Tere Daaman Me Rakh Denge
Humse Pyar Ka Izhaar Karke To Dekho

st: Hamare Ashk Mein Apka Khwab Chhupa Hai
s:
Hamare Ashk Mein Apka Khwab Chhupa Hai
Hamari Khushi Mein Apka Ehsas Chupa Hai
Tum Hamari Dastan Mein Raho Ya Na Raho
Lekin Is Dil Mein Hamesha Aapke Liye Pyar Chupa Hai…

st: Saadgi Wali Surat Hai Tumhari
s:
Saadgi Wali Surat Hai Tumhari
Dil Me Samayi Murat Hai Tumhari
Doob K Aksar Kho Jata Hu Jisme
Vo Aankhe Bhi Bahut Khoobsurat Hain Tumhari

st: Jo Bani Ho Mere Liye
s:
Jo Bani Ho Mere Liye
Jis Ke Liye Main Jee Raha Hoon
Jo Kahe Hum Saath Hain Tere
Jise Dekhne K Liye Tadap Raha Hoon
Ek Aisa Hi Dildaar Chahiye
Bus Mujhe Mera Pyar Chahiye…

st: Apne Hothon Par Saja Kar Tujhe Main
s:
Apne Hothon Par Saja Kar Tujhe Main
Tere Hi Geet Gana Chahta Hoon
Jal Kar Bujh Jana Humari Kismat Sahi
Bas Ek Baar Roshan Hona Chahta Hoon…

st: Sajde Dil Mein Tarane Bahut Hain
s:
Sajde Dil Mein Tarane Bahut Hain
Zindagi Jeene Ke Bahane Bahut Hain
Aap Sada Muskurate Rahiye
Aap Ki Muskurahat Ke Deewane Bahut Hain…

st: Aasmaan Hi Nahi Saare Sitare Bhi Humare Hain
s:
Aasmaan Hi Nahi Saare Sitare Bhi Humare Hain
Aap Jo Akele Ho To Hum Aapke Sahare Hain
Jis Pal Aap Hume Yaad Karte Ho
Wo Lamhe Saare Jahan Se Pyare Hain…

st: Na Jaane Wo Kaun Tera Habeeb Hoga
s:
Na Jaane Wo Kaun Tera Habeeb Hoga
Tere Hatho Mein Jiska Naseeb Hoga
Koi Tumhe Chahe Ye Koi Badi Baat Nahi
Jisko Tum Chaho Wo Khush Naseeb Hoga…

st: Sanwla Rang Tera Behtreen Lagta Hai
s:
Sanwla Rang Tera Behtreen Lagta Hai
Nazar Ko Ye Tera Naazara Haseen Lagta Hai
Aate Ho Jb Baahon Me Simat Kr
To Sara Alam Rangeen Lagta…

st: Saanson Mein Basaya Tumko
s:
Saanson Mein Basaya Tumko
Aankhon Mein Tera Chehra Samaya
Dekhe Kai Haseen Chehre Humne Par Yeh Dil Tumpe Aaya
Har Ek Khwaab Ko Humne Teri Mohhabat Se Sajakar
Usko Hamesha Ke Liye Is Dil Mei Basaya…

st: Tere Liye Maine Sajaye Khwabon Me Chaand Taare
s:
Tere Liye Maine Sajaye Khwabon Me Chaand Taare
Rango Se Bhara Sama Ko Roshan Huye Nazare
Aisa Laga Dil Ko Kar Rahen Hain Wo Sab Bhi Ishaare
Ek Pal Me Na Jaane Kaise Ban Gaye Tum Sab Kuch Hamare…

st: Chehra Mera Tha Nigahein Uski
s:
Chehra Mera Tha Nigahein Uski
Khamoshi Mein Bhi Thi Baatein Uski
Mere Chehre Pe Ghazal Likhti Gayi
Sher Kehti Hui Aankhein Uski…

st: Chhu Ke Tere Komal Honth
s:
Chhu Ke Tere Komal Honth
Maine Shabnam-E-Jam Peeya
Sanson Mein Mahekti Rahi
Zakhm-E-Dil-E-Chingari Dahekti Rahi…

st: Baarish Ki Boondon Ka Aapke Hothon Se Fisalna
s:
Baarish Ki Boondon Ka Aapke Hothon Se Fisalna
Dil Ko Ghayal Kar Jata Hai
Reshmi Julfon Mein Unka Sarakna
Dil Ko Bahut Lubhata Hai
Laakh Koshish Karta Hun Lekin
Humko Chain Kahan Aata Hai
Yahi To Mousam Hai Yaaron
Jab Ishq Jawaan Ho Jata Hai…..

st: Izhaar-E-Mohabbat Ki Humne Aapne Hum Par Aitbaar Kiya
s:
Izhaar-E-Mohabbat Ki Humne Aapne Hum Par Aitbaar Kiya
Sooni Padi Bematlab Zindagi Ko Aapne Ek Aayaam Diya
Yun Laga Ek Pal Mein Humne Saare Jahaan Ko Pa Liya
Apni Zindagi Ka Har Lamha Aaj Se Aapke Naam Kiya…

st: Wo Jo Muskurate Hain To Dil Ko Ghayal Kar Jaate Hain
s:
Wo Jo Muskurate Hain To Dil Ko Ghayal Kar Jaate Hain
Khud Ko Bhoola Kar Bas Unko Dekhte Reh Jaate Hain
Koi To Baat Hai Jaroor Unki Kaatil Aadaon Mein
Sambhalte Hain Khud Ko Magar Unki Taraf Khiche Chale Jaate Hain…

st: Upar Se Gussa Dil Se Pyar Karte Ho
s:
Upar Se Gussa Dil Se Pyar Karte Ho
Nazrein Churate Ho Dil Bekrar Karte Ho
Laakh Chhupao Duniya Se Mujhe Sab Pata Hai
Tum Mujhe Apne Aap Se Jayda Pyar Karte Ho…

st: Meri Band Aankho Ka Sacha Khwab Ho Tum
s:
Meri Band Aankho Ka Sacha Khwab Ho Tum
In Tanhaiyon Ke Sawalo Ka Jawab Ho Tum
Ab To Duniya Bhi Rooth Jaye To Gam Na Hoga
Meri Duniya, Kaynaat, Mera Chand Ho Tum…

st: Na Khwabon Mein Dekha
s:
Na Khwabon Mein Dekha
Na Nazaaro Mein Dekha
Bas Hazaron Mein Ek Aap Hi Ko Dekha
Gham Dene Wale To Har Qadam Par Hain Yahan
Har Pal Khushi Dene Walon Mein Ek Aapko Dekha…

st: Meri Aankho Mein Na Dekho Neend Chura Lenge
s:
Meri Aankho Mein Na Dekho Neend Chura Lenge
Na Dil Ke Kareeb Aao Warna Mohabbat Sikha Denge
Gehra Hai Aapse Rista Itna
Khwabo Mein Bhi Aaye To Apna Bana Lenge…

st: Unki Reshami Julfon Ki Sadaon Mein Kho Gaye Hum Is Kadar
s:
Unki Reshami Julfon Ki Sadaon Mein Kho Gaye Hum Is Kadar
Ki Ab Raat Ho Ya Din Bas Unka Khyaal Aata Hai
Aankhon Ko Bas Unka Chehra Raas Aata Hai
Wo Nazarein Churate Hain Humse Kabhi Zamane Se Darkar
Phir Bhi Na Jaane Unpe Kyun Itna Pyaar Aata Hai

st: Mujhko Phir Wahi Suhana Nazara Mil Gaya
s:
Mujhko Phir Wahi Suhana Nazara Mil Gaya
Nazro Ko Jo Deedar Tumhara Mil Gaya
Aur Kisi Cheez Ki Tamanna Kyu Karu
Jab Mujhe Teri Baaho Mein Sahara Mil Gaya…

st: Tasveer Ko Teri Banate Hain Aankhon Mein
s:
Tasveer Ko Teri Banate Hain Aankhon Mein
Khushboo Ko Teri Basate Hain Sanson Mein
Jab Se Mohabbat Huyi Hai Tumse Jaane Tamanna
Har Khwab Ko Teri Yaadon Se Sajate Hain Raaton Mein…

st: Jaroorat Hai Mujhe Tere Pyaar Ki
s:
Jaroorat Hai Mujhe Tere Pyaar Ki
Chahat Hai Mujhe Tere Ikraar Ki
Jaante Hain Hum Tumko Is Kadar
Gunjayish Hi Nahi Kisi Takraar Ki

st: Yu Haqeeqat Se Parda Utha Dijeye
s:
Yu Haqeeqat Se Parda Utha Dijeye
Hai Mohabbat To Sabhi Ko Bata Dijeye
Chand Ki Taab Bhi Feeqi Par Jayegi
Julf Cehre Pe Apne Gira Ligiye
Ab Koi Jagah Raas Aati Nahi Apni Palko Pe Hamko Bitha Ligeye

st: Aa Kahi Saamne Zara To Tujhko Aankhon Mein Basa Lu
s:
Aa Kahi Saamne Zara To Tujhko Aankhon Mein Basa Lu
Har Khwab Ko Apne Teri Yaadon Se Saja Du
Nigahon Mein Basakar Dhadkano Ko Tera Pata Du
Phir Unhi Ke Sahare Saari Zindagi Bita Du

st: Aankhe Ashk Nahi Samandar Hai Tumhari
s:
Aankhe Ashk Nahi Samandar Hai Tumhari
Jinki Lahro Mein Hai Aahat Hmari
Ek Boond Bhi Na Girne Denge Zameen Pe
Yeh Ankhe Nahi Pyaas Hai Hmari

st: Hal Pal Ki Khushi Aapki Yaad Mein Hai
s:
Hal Pal Ki Khushi Aapki Yaad Mein Hai
Humari Har Dua Aapke Sath Mein Hai
Door Reh Kar Bhi Aapko Yaad Karte Hain
Zaroor Koi Pyari Si Ada Aap Mein Hai

st: Naam-E-Mohabbat Se Khushbu-E-Wafa Aati Hai
s:
Naam-E-Mohabbat Se Khushbu-E-Wafa Aati Hai
Mere Dil Se Teri Dhadkan Ki Sada Aati Hai
Jab Bhi Karte Ho Yaad Hume Dil Se
Yu Lagta Hai Jaise Jannat Se Hawa Aati Hai…

st: Aapne Apni Aankho Mein Noor Chupa Rakha Hai
s:
Aapne Apni Aankho Mein Noor Chupa Rakha Hai
Hosh Walo Ko Deewana Bana Rakha
Naaj Kaise Na Karu Aapke Pyar Par
Mujh Jaise Nacheez Ko Khas Bana Rakha Hai…

st: Ishq Ke Maayne Humse Mat Pucho
s:
Ishq Ke Maayne Humse Mat Pucho
Hum Bhi Is Se Anjaan Hain
Sirf Ek Guzarish Hai Ke Kabhi Door Na Jana
Kyonki Aapka Ishq Hi Hamari Jaan Hai…

st: Wo Khud Nahi Jaanti Wo Kitni Pyari Hai
s:
Wo Khud Nahi Jaanti Wo Kitni Pyari Hai
Jaan Hai Hamari Hume Jaan Se Pyari Hai
Dooriyo Ke Hone Se Kya Fark Padta Hai
Wo Kal Bhi Hamari Thi Aaj Bhi Hamari Hai…

st: Palko Se Aankho Ki Hifazat Hoti Hai
s:
Palko Se Aankho Ki Hifazat Hoti Hai
Dhadkan Dil Ki Amanat Hoti Hai
Hamara Rishta Bhi Bada Pyara Hai
Kabhi Chahat To Kabhi Shikayat Hoti Hai…

st: Bekhud Kiya Yun Humko
s:
Bekhud Kiya Yun Humko
Kisi Ajnabi Ne Is Kadar
Sayad Mil Jaaye Wo Phir Kabhi
Isliye Ghoomte Hain Hum Dar Badar
Hosh Bhi Nahin Rehta Shaam Ho Ya Sehar
Betabi Ka Aisa Aalam Kare Har Khushi Beasar

st: Aapse Ho Na Baat To Hum Fikar Karte Hain
s:
Aapse Ho Na Baat To Hum Fikar Karte Hain
Har Waqt Khud Se Aapka Zikar Karte Hai
Aap Ka Pyar Humara Naseeb Hai Sanam
Is Baat Ka Rab Se Shukriya Karte Hain…

st: Haseen Palon Ko Yaad Kar Rahe The
s:
Haseen Palon Ko Yaad Kar Rahe The
Sitaro Se Aapki Baat Kar Rahe The
Dil Ko Bada Sakoon Mila Ye Jaan Kar Ki
Aap Bhi Mujhe Yaad Kar Rahe The…

st: Mithi-Mithi Yaadein Palko Me Saza Lena
s:
Mithi-Mithi Yaadein Palko Me Saza Lena
Sath Guzre Pal Ko Dil Me Basa Lena
Nazar Na Aaun Dil Me Agar
Muskura Kar Mujhe Sapno Me Bula Lena…

st: Har Subah Ki Dhoop Kuch Yaad Dilati Hai
s:
Har Subah Ki Dhoop Kuch Yaad Dilati Hai
Har Phool Ki Khushbu Ek Jadu Jagati Hai
Chahu Na-Chahu Kitna Bhi Par
Subah-Subah Aapki Yaad Aa Hi Jati Hai…

st: Aap Jab Saamne Se Gujar Jate Hain
s:
Aap Jab Saamne Se Gujar Jate Hain
Armaan Dil Ke Saare Ubhar Aate Hain
Dekh Kar Aapki Pyari Surat
Sehme Hue Se Phool Bhi Muskura Jate Hain…

st: Muskurane Ki Har Wajah Aap Ho
s:
Muskurane Ki Har Wajah Aap Ho
Hamari Zindagi Mein Har Jagah Aap Ho
Hume Milegi Jab Bhi Koi Khushi
Hum Samajh Jayenge Khuda Se Dua Karne Wale Aap Ho…

st: Kisi Ke Paigam Ko Zara Pyar Se Padha Kijiye
s:
Kisi Ke Paigam Ko Zara Pyar Se Padha Kijiye
Kisi Ki Chahat Ka Ehsas Kiya Kijiye
Koi Dil Se Yaad Karta Hai Aapko
Kam Se Kam Hichkiyan To Liya Kijiye…

st: Uski Yaado Mein
s:
Uski Yaado Mein
Uski Baato Mein
Kahi Mera Aks Jhilmilata Hoga
Laakh Masroof Hoga Apne Kaamo Mein
Phir Bhi Hame Soch Kar
Kabhi To Muskurata Hoga…

st: Hum Unke Husn Mein Is Kadar Kho Jate Hain
s:
Hum Unke Husn Mein Is Kadar Kho Jate Hain
Unko Batane Mein Zamaane Lag Jate Hain
Ek Wo Hain Jo Palke Uthate Hain
Aur Ek Hi Nazar Mein Sab Kuch Keh Jaate Hain…

st: Lagta Hai Koi Hum Se Khafa Hai
s:
Lagta Hai Koi Hum Se Khafa Hai
Par Uski Har Sasns Mein Wafa
Nahi Hai Us Jaisa Koi Duniya Mein
Tabhi To Us Par Meri Ye Jaan Fida Hai

st: Tujhe Khawabo Se Koi Dur Na Kare
s:
Tujhe Khawabo Se Koi Dur Na Kare
Tujhse Narazgi Ki Koi Bhool Na Kare
Har Sheesha Tere Chehre Ka Gulam Ho Jaye
Varna Toot Jaye Wo Aaina Jo Tujhe Qabool Na Kare…

st: Apne Dil Mein Armaan Koi Rakhna
s:
Apne Dil Mein Armaan Koi Rakhna
Duniya Ki Bheed Mein Pehchan Koi Rakhna
Acche Nahi Lagte Jab Hote Ho Udaas
In Hothon Pe Sada Muskaan Banaye Rakhna…

st: Nasha Tha Unke Pyar Ka
s:
Nasha Tha Unke Pyar Ka
Jis Mein Hum Kho Gaye
Unhe Bhi Nahi Pata Chala
Ki Kab Hum Unke Ho Gaye…

st: Nigahon Se Dil Mein Ghar Karke
s:
Nigahon Se Dil Mein Ghar Karke
Mere Khawabon Ki Haqiqat Ho Gaye Ho Tum
Ishq Ke Safar Ki Manzil Banke
Meri Bekhudi Ki Wahaj Ho Gaye Ho Tum…

st: Muqaddar Mein Likhi Koi Baat Ho Tum
s:
Muqaddar Mein Likhi Koi Baat Ho Tum
Taqdeer Ke Ek Khubsurat Saugaat Ho Tum
Karke Pyar Tumse Mehsoos Ye Hua
Jaise Sadiyon Se Yuhi Mere Sath Ho Tum…

st: Wo Jo Sar Jhuka Ke Baithe Hain
s:
Wo Jo Sar Jhuka Ke Baithe Hain
Hamara Dil Churaye Baithe Hain
Humne Unse Kaha Hamara Dil Hume Lauta Do
To Bole Hum To Hatho Mein Mehendi Laga Ke Baithe Hain…

st: Pyar Ki Anokhi Murat Ho Tum
s:
Pyar Ki Anokhi Murat Ho Tum
Zindagi Ki Ek Zaruat Ho Tum
Phool To Khoobsurat Hote Hi Hai
Par Phoolo Se Bhi Khoobsurat Ho Tum
